Buelta Carrillo, L
Val Bernal, J F
metadata.dc:description: A study on the life prognosis of patients with carcinoma of the colon and rectum is made. 393 patients are studied, 90% of which were followed up during five years or until their death. The authors indicate the classification of stages they have followed with good correlation results, and without overlapping of the survival calculations for the different subgroups.
metadata.dc:title: Pron칩stico global y clasificaci칩n por estadios del carcinoma colorrectal.
[Global prognosis and stage classification of colorectal carcinoma].
